snippet.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 - Subtitle Update for Mobile
snippet.description:
Please subscribe to our channel!

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/five-nights-at-freddys-4/id1023146677
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf4&hl=en_US&gl=US

Please get your flashlight from under the bed ready, Check your closet, doors and bed because the latest update for #FNaF 4 is now live on Apple's iOS App Store and Google's Android Play Store. Please allow for up to 48 hours for the update to hit your device!

This update includes the following...

- Subtitles in 11 languages (see app description)
- Faster and smoother animations [ios]
- Improved controls to allow closing doors/using flashlight immediately
- Increased global audio volume
- Fixed the pan of some audio samples [ios]
- Night 8 can now be unlocked by tapping 8 times on the relevant button
- Improved virtual controller
- Revamped vibrations

#MadeWithFusion #Horror
